info: Driven Brands Holdings Inc. provides automotive services to retail and commercial customers in North America and internationally. The company offers various services, such as paint, collision, glass, vehicle repair, oil change, maintenance, and car wash services. It also distributes a range of automotive aftermarket parts to parts stores, repair facilities, and service stations, as well as provides consulting services to independently owned or branded auto and collision repair shops. As of March 27, 2021, the company operated 4,249 company-operated, franchised, and independently-operated stores. Driven Brands Holdings Inc. was founded in 1972 and is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.
